overview: Egon Wilcsek, Senior Regional Director since February 2012 responsible for Central and Northern Europe. Previously, he was responsible for 4 years in the Omniture Business Unit of Adobe as Channel Sales Manager for Central and Eastern Europe. In his 7 years at Siebel Systems, most recently as director of marketing, he experienced online marketing from his early beginnings and also gained national and international experience in various disciplines, such as public relations, reference marketing or lead generation.
